name: Acorn Head
description:
Acorn Head

You’re playing an acorn who has to run away from the flood of the cascade. Can you run away from the cascade? Will you survive? Will see…

Controls

Move Up: W - Upper Arrow Stick

Move Left: A - Right Arrow Stick

Move Right: D - Left Arrow Stick: 

Shoot:  Mouse Left Click  (Acorn is able to shoot only while jumping one time, touching ground will reload automatically).

Team

Game Programer: Emircan Birbil

Game Artist: Meltem Bildirici

Game Designer: Baha Tan Oral
